definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: traveller (properly a going, journey, whence wayfarer, traveller) only [[וַיׇּבאׁ הֵלֶךְ לְאִישׁ הֶעָשִׁיר]] 2Sa 12:4 (‖[[הָאׂרֵחַ הַבָּא לוֹ]], [[הָאִישׁ הֵבָּא לוֹ]]);—in MT 1Sa 14:26 [[הֵלֶךְ דְּבָשׁ]], ´[[ה]] must be cstr. & = flowing, or dropping (of honey), but rd. rather [[הָלַח]] LXX The Klo We Dr (& [[דְּבּׂרוֹ]] for [[דְּבַשׁ]] q.v., LXX We Dr).
